# Seed issues for Orion

This file is a starter list you can copy into GitHub Issues.
Create epics first (Issues labeled `epic`), then create child issues under each epic.

## Suggested epics
- Epic: Repository + training infrastructure
- Epic: Structured sparse attention
- Epic: Norm control / stability
- Epic: Evaluation + reporting
- Epic: Presentation + final report

## Suggested labels
- epic
- type:feat, type:bug, type:experiment, type:chore
- area:infra, area:model, area:sparse-attn, area:stability, area:eval, area:docs
- prio:p0, prio:p1, prio:p2
